body:
# Linting

Linting your code is a good practice. You can easily add a good convention by adding ESLint with a existing config like eslint-config-i-am-meticulous.

By default, ESLint and the above config is already added in your dependencies.
You just need to add your package.json the following eslint config :

{
  "eslintConfig": {
    "extends": [
      "eslint-config-i-am-meticulous",
      "eslint-config-i-am-meticulous/react"
    ]
  }
}
